name: Toss Titans (wfaigen)
description:
Pickup, toss, and swap between two Vaudeville Strongmen to cover great distances and navigate high-flying levels. 

Both Toss Titans have unique movement values, but share the ability to pick up and toss their counterpart. Sound like an exciting performance? The director didn't think so! As the show continues, the script keeps getting rewritten requiring more high-flying antics. Watch and be amazed as these Large Lads embrace their on-the-fly-written-in elemental techniques to overcome increasingly difficult carnival challenges!

Submission for the 2020 DK30 hosted by Day[9]. 

Theme: Two are better than one.
